content: crochet something cute and functional for your kitchen the encircle me potholder is made by crocheting 2 identical circles together to create a double thick potholder that won t burn your fingers or your counters > this pot holder pattern is part of the ** 2023 pot holders galore crochet-along 1 ** and with the purchase of an ebook you will receive a total of 12 +1 bonus pot holder patterns one pattern every month during the crochet-along in december you ll receive the final pot holder along with the bonus pattern > the free pattern for the encircle me pot holder can be found ** here 2 ** > the complete video tutorial can be found ** here 3 ** > you can learn more about the pot holders galore crochet along ** here 4 ** > the ** ad-free printable pdf 5 ** includes 2 patterns in 1 encircle me potholder and matching coaster skill level advanced beginner language english crochet terminology us terms crochet stitch chain slip_stitch reverse single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet front post double_crochet size this pot holder measures 9 5 in diameter but instructions are provided to customize the size of your pot holder > materials * 4 0mm crochet hook needed * 175 yds / 160 m of any medium 4 worsted weight cotton yarn * scissors * yarn needle * stitch marker or safety pin i hope you enjoy making your pot holders 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/2023-pot-holders-galore-crochet-along 2 https //thispixiecreates com/how-to-crochet-the-encircle-me-potholder-pgcal2023/ 3 https //youtu be/97rwdawjhro 4 https //thispixiecreates com/pot-holders-galore-crochet-along-2023-main-page/ 5 https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/encircle-me-coaster--potholder-ebook
